author: Adam Taylor
title: What caused the coronavirus? A skeptical take on the theories about the outbreak's Chinese origin.
description: The theories, originally about biological weapons, have mutated rapidly since January.
content: In the United States, such speculation largely comes from politicians hawkish against Beijing and keen to defend the Trump administration. Scientists, meanwhile, are often the most hesitant to speak out, wanting to focus on research that helps end the outbrea… [+6630 chars]
